name: WPL Dry Chain Lube 120ml
description: A dry chain lube designed for those dry and dusty rides. This bio-based lube creates a thin film around moving chain links to reduce friction and improve shifting.Premium bio-based formula made with natural ingredients.Surface-binding compounds improve pedal efficiency and reduce wear.Long-lasting formula improves pedal efficiency by reducing chain wear and friction.For use on bicycle chains, shifters, derailleurs and cables.Biodegradable, PTFE-free formula is kind on the environment.
